name: Kio's Adventure
description: "Kio's Adventure" tells the story about a high school girl named Kio suddenly goes to a different world which is surrounded by organs and monsters after a wired earthquake. Players need to help Kio escape this horrible world. The game artwork uses 16bit pixel style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 32/64bit Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or greater Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 700 MB available space
